channel.title: InYourBones — Bay Area Radar (far_out)
channel.description: Curated upcoming Bay Area shows from InYourBones.

item.title: Florence + The Machine @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-05-16 02:30 — Florence + The Machine at Chase Center. Florence + The Machine is known for their powerful live performances and emotional depth, making this a highly anticipated tour.

item.title: Demi Lovato @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-05-12 03:00 — Demi Lovato at Chase Center. Demi Lovato's upcoming tour promises to showcase her vocal prowess and personal growth, attracting significant buzz.

item.title: Maggie Lindemann @ August Hall
item.description: 2026-03-21 03:00 — Maggie Lindemann at August Hall. Maggie Lindemann's rise in the pop-punk genre and her engaging stage presence make her a must-see act.

item.title: Bad Omens @ Oakland Arena
item.description: 2026-03-28 02:00 — Bad Omens at Oakland Arena. Bad Omens has been gaining traction in the rock scene with their energetic performances and dedicated fanbase.

item.title: Jack Johnson @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-10-01 01:30 → 2026-10-02 01:30 — Jack Johnson at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Jack Johnson's laid-back style and connection with fans create a unique concert experience that resonates with many.

item.title: Rainbow Kitten Surprise @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-07-19 03:00 — Rainbow Kitten Surprise at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Rainbow Kitten Surprise is known for their eclectic sound and captivating live shows, making this a standout event.

item.title: Bob Moses @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-07-18 02:30 — Bob Moses at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Bob Moses & Cannons are set to deliver a memorable night of electronic-infused rock, appealing to a diverse audience.

item.title: Three Days Grace @ SAP Center at San Jose
item.description: 2026-11-19 03:00 — Three Days Grace at SAP Center at San Jose. Three Days Grace continues to be a strong presence in rock, and their live shows are known for high energy and fan engagement.

item.title: Train @ Shoreline Amphitheatre
item.description: 2026-08-27 01:45 — Train at Shoreline Amphitheatre. Train's anniversary tour celebrates their legacy with hits that resonate with fans of multiple generations.

item.title: The Neighbourhood @ Bill Graham Civic Auditorium
item.description: 2026-10-08 02:30 — The Neighbourhood at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. Jeff Tweedy's solo performances are intimate and showcase his songwriting prowess, appealing to indie music fans.

item.title: RUSH @ SAP Center at San Jose
item.description: 2026-10-18 02:30 — RUSH at SAP Center at San Jose. RUSH's upcoming shows are a celebration of their legacy, appealing to classic rock enthusiasts.

item.title: O.A.R. @ The Masonic
item.description: 2026-08-13 01:30 — O.A.R. at The Masonic. Melody's Echo Chamber's unique sound and captivating performances are sure to resonate with indie music lovers.

item.title: Father John Misty @ The Castro Theatre
item.description: 2026-03-25 03:00 — Father John Misty at The Castro Theatre. Tycho's atmospheric sound and immersive live shows create a unique experience for electronic music fans.

item.title: Maddox Batson @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2026-04-05 03:00 — Maddox Batson at The Fillmore. Olivia Dean's soulful sound and storytelling ability make her performances a must-see for R&B fans.

item.title: Vendredi sur Mer @ The Independent
item.description: 2026-03-20 03:00 — Vendredi sur Mer at The Independent.
